dr.evolution.alignment
Class SimpleAlignment

java.lang.Object
  dr.evolution.sequence.Sequences
      dr.evolution.alignment.SimpleAlignment
All Implemented Interfaces:
Alignment, PatternList, SiteList, SequenceList, TaxonList, Attributable, Identifiable, XHTMLable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Iterable<Taxon>
Direct Known Subclasses:
CharSetAlignment, CompleteHistorySimulator
public class SimpleAlignment
extends Sequences
implements Alignment, XHTMLable

A simple alignment class that implements gaps by characters in the sequences.

Version:
$Id: SimpleAlignment.java,v 1.46 2005/06/21 16:25:15 beth Exp $
Author:
Andrew Rambaut, Alexei Drummond
See Also:
Serialized Form
